Description.Name: Active Probe (C)
Description.Details: The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry. TheÂ ClansÂ never 'lost' the technology, but dispensed with the 'Beagle' name when they polished the concept.
